document_data.name: Shieldsar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shieldsar''' was the standing army of the city of [[Sundabar]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Duties: The Shieldsar patrolled the wilderness on [[horse]]back, fully armed. Ever vigilant, and wary of potential ambushes, patrol leaders got to know every foot of their respective routes.

Forces.Members: The Shieldsar would often take in members of of the [[Watchful]] or [[Stone Shields]] that became complacent, or who flirted with corruption. By the same token, "problematic" soldiers of the Shieldsar were often transferred to a post with the [[Watchblade]].
